0000000100000011	01011 [x]
0000010110000100	01000 [x]
0100000000011011	10011 [x]
0100100000001101	01101 [x]
0101000000001101	01101 [x]

0001010011000001	00111 [x]
0001100011100101	00100 [x]

0011110000000101	01010 [x]
0000000011101000	01111 [x]

0000011101000010	11100 [x]

	constant rom: reg_grid := (
		--Zaid
		"0000000000000000",
		"1000000000000001",
		"0000000000000010",
		"0000000000000011",
		"0000000000000100",
		"0000000000000101",
		"0000000000000110",
		"0000000000000111",
		"0000000000001000",
		"0000000000001001",
		"1000000000011110",

		--Ramses
		"0011010001100110",
		"0011000101000101",
		"0001001010100000",
		"0001000010100000",
		"0001100000001110",
		"0001100000011110",
		"0000110000001111",

		"0000011101000010",
		"0000000101010010",

		--Ivan

		"0001010011000001",
		"0000110011000001",
